guns skins! summed up my middle school experience
日日白给，夜夜白给，什么时候都要白给。

It is a very fun game. However there is a skill curve that is hard for new players to overcome. The depth of the game is unmatched by other FPS games. There is always room for improvement however. I would say that the game has an issue with cheaters and lack of game modes that are fun for casual players. Graphics are also dated, but I don't care about that.
Melhor FPS tático e competitivo da história.
Jogo CS desde a versão 1.4, essa versão do CS ficou bem legal... gráfico muito bom e a jogabilidade também... recomendo!!!
